items.title: ‘Escape From Tarkov’ Release Date Revealed
items.description: The release date for Escape From Tarkov has been revealed, with the game finally set to leave beta in the coming weeks.

items.title: Is The AI Bubble Bursting? Lessons From The Dot-Com Era
items.description: AI’s rapid rise mirrors the dot-com era, with soaring valuations, heavy data center spending and investor concerns over a possible bubble.

items.title: Generics Must Compete On Price, Not Safety
items.description: The FDA’s draft guidance sends the opposite message: that standards can be bent, and safety is negotiable.

items.title: Why Nvidia Earnings Matter More To Markets Than What The Fed Chair Says
items.description: Investors know what the Fed chair is likely to say. But uncertainty over Nvidia's earnings could worry investors concerned about an AI bubble.

items.title: Why More People Without Diabetes Are Using Glucose Monitors
items.description: Glucose monitors promise real-time insights into health, but data can be misleading without context. Here’s what to know before trying one.
